about_the_game:
A slowly but surely dying world. A world where the greed of the gods has threatened its very existence. A world where mortals have fallen victim to the ambitions of others.

The world in which Laothar az Dirnath lives. A member of a count's family with four charming sisters, he enjoys the life of an aristocrat, is successful among women and has many friends. And a secret that even he himself does not know.

What awaits the young man in the future? A long and happy life next to loved ones? Losses and suffering leading to an inglorious death? The throne of the enemy of humanity? The title of its protector? A harem of all sorts of races, from pretty goblins to graceful vampires? The one and only love until death?

All this depends only on his secret. On you.

Abyss Lord is a novel designed to give what many people lack in games. Variability. And no, we are not talking about a standard choice from several options. We are talking about knowledge of the future - and the ability to change it.

From now on, saving and loading are not just game conventions. These are your personal abilities that directly affect history. Having received an undesirable outcome, you can return to the past and avoid it, even if it was initially impossible.

Save a comrade from an unexpected injury. Warn in advance about a danger that no one was prepared for. Correct a mistake made by others. After all, even after a reboot, you will remember what should happen next. The fate of Laotar, his loved ones and the whole world is in your hands.

But do not forget: what you can do, others can do too. Do not relax just because such power is available to you.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains scenes of  nudity of female bodies, the game does not cross the line of depravity, however, it often demonstrates the beauty of the female body. There are also scenes of fights with an abundance of violence and blood in the game, this does not happen often, but you should know this in advance.
The game has scenes with the use of tobacco and alcohol.
